Other.Quote: True freedom comes only from true wisdom.
Other.Author: Debasish Mridha

Other.Quote: Initially, the truth may hurt, but lies hurt always.

Other.Quote: Be an advocate of love and kindness.

Other.Quote: Either plan your life or get ready to get lost.

Other.Quote: Enjoy your passion.

Other.Quote: When you smile, you bloom.

Other.Quote: My love always surrounds everyone around me.

Other.Quote: My ego is the wall between you and me.

Other.Quote: Laughter is the most important paradise of life.

Other.Quote: Doing more for others makes your life more abundant.

Other.Quote: Improve your relationship with you.

Other.Quote: Happiness is a fresh flower!

Other.Quote: I am not what you are. I am only what I can see. I am me.

Other.Quote: The best punishment for an enemy is forgiveness.

Other.Quote: Living is not enough; we must live an illuminated life.

Other.Quote: We are half awake and semi conscious.

Other.Quote: Enlighten every life with love to shine.

Other.Quote: Change your thoughts to change your reality.

Other.Quote: Objectivity allows you the luxury of not taking sides

Other.Quote: Something that trash for me, might be diamond for you.

Other.Quote: Closed eyes cannot see light

Other.Quote: Take every opportunity to express kindness.

Other.Quote: Forgiveness takes away the burdens of past.
Other.Author: Debasish Mridha

Other.Quote: Be wise enough to forgive; be kind enough to love.

Other.Quote: You may fall many times, but you must keep going.

Other.Quote: Try your best; forget the rest.

Other.Quote: The universe is inside you; you are the cosmic power.

Other.Quote: Love is the bridge that crosses over the river of hate.

Other.Quote: Adversity often defines dignity.

Other.Quote: Stay in love.

Other.Quote: Let me get lost in the mysteries of your heart.

Other.Quote: Take me to a land where love never ends.

Other.Quote: Be unique! Be yourself!

Other.Quote: With the wind of love, let your heart dance like a flower.

Other.Quote: Like a child, always enjoy the world.

Other.Quote: Be the designer of your own future.

Other.Quote: Your real beauty is hidden in your heart.

Other.Quote: I love you not only for today and tomorrow but forever.

Other.Quote: A smile is a blue sky where the mind can fly.

Other.Quote: Where have all the Fembots gone?
Other.Author: Ren Garcia
